properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA TO DOMINICA.
DNC 14.
F/V PIROGUE, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
ADRIFT BETWEEN SAINT LUCIA (14-05N 060-57W) AND
DOMINICA (15-13N 061-22W). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
